name: Sonic.exe and temporary nightmare
description: Welcome to the temporary paradox, A demon called Exeime, is going to take souls from his friends, and from this he will make them temporary, to become stronger and was able to open a portal of other demons from other universes. you'll have to go through the old zones, pass the to the election and an incredible battle with Exeime. Don't let the lilac-eyed hedgehog get in the hands of heroes!
